This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi live in chicago and like everyone else here was snowed in yesterday wednesday 2\2\11 after 22 inches of snow came down tuesday 2\1. i was bored so i started a webcam time lapsed video of the sse chicago night sky. i figured it would be a ok night to record the sky since midway and ohare were basically closed there would be little or no air traffic. i did not see the formations when viewing the sky myself only after watching the time lapse video played back. it was recorded from about 5:45 to 6:05 pm cdt over west side of chicago on wed feb 2. it shows to me multiple sphere ufos blinking on and off while formed in to triangle shapes with other spheres, looking almost encamped in the sky. i see about three different sets of triangle lights in the video. one set of lights had four points in a square shape at the very top middle of the video but then moved back to 3 points and hovers. the video took a picture every 3 seconds of the sky. a flash of light comes across the sky at the same time the lights are blinking in the time lapse. im not sure what it is, ufo possibly, plane idk. i did my best enhancing the video the best i could to see if i could make out what shape it was. i will try and post the video here and on youtube. my screenname on you tube is guttergawker or search webcam chicago ufo 2011. ufos are very much real and are visiting earth on a daily basis in my no body special opinion. i am not sure what they want only that i see and film them quite consitently and that they are always around watching even if you can see them. thanks for reading!
